Group: Control Data- Angle and Distance from Center of the Corresponding Base

Using keys for directional movement will change the VectorX and VectorY attributes. An angle can be determined using the vectorToAngle function in the expression editor using these attributes.
Default keys are mapped to ARROW KEYS but can be changed to your own preference.
Rule: Use TOUCH controls if KEYBOARD not in use
Rule: Set Touch Number If it is not already set
Group: Set the touch number if it collides with the actor corresponding to that touch
